verses.name: Psalms 139:13
verses.text: For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother’s womb.

verses.name: Psalms 139:14
verses.text: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.

verses.name: Psalms 139:15
verses.text: My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 139:16
verses.text: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
